content: leg with fiberfill fold the leg flat together and close the hole with 5 single_crochet through both layers cut the yarn leave the tail fasten_off the thread and hide the tail arm round 1 6sc in mc 6 round 2 1sc 1 increase 2sc 1 increase 1sc 8 round 3 8 single_crochet change th color of yarn round 4-16 8 single_crochet slip_stitch stuff only 4 row with fiberfill fold the arm flat together and close the hole with 4 single_crochet through both layers cut the yarn leave the tail fasten_off the thread and hide the tail body chain 30 leave long tail for sewing and join them with a slip_stitch into the first chain from here work in spiral rounds 1-10 30 single_crochet 10 row turn out crocheting fold the edges together put legs inside as on a pictuce crochet 1 single_crochet 5sc thought leg stiches in order to attach it 3sc 5sc thought leg stiches 1 single_crochet slip_stitch to fastern the yarn now are legs connected with the body and we can continue crocheting round 11 3 single_crochet decrease *6 24 round 12 24 single_crochet round 13 4 single_crochet join arm 8 single_crochet 4 single_crochet join the second arm 8 single_crochet 24 single_crochet start to stuff the body with fillfiber round 14 2 single_crochet decrease *6 18 round 15 1 single_crochet decrease *6 12 stuff with fiberfill sew the head to the body sew ears don`t forget about the tail on the top of the head with 1 row gap as on the picture if you have followed all the instructions congratulations your rabbit is ready and you have done a great job
